episodes.title: 77 Interview with Former Member Jordan M. Part 1
episodes.description: On this episode of Playing in Traffic we are joined by Jordan Martino who now lives in Saudi Arabia. Her WMSCOG journey started in 2009 when she was just 17 years old in New Jersey. The cult took advantage of her young age and controlled every aspect of her life. We are so glad she shared her story and has found freedom. Some parts of the audio are a little scratchy but we tried to keep all of the content in so bare with us on those parts. We were speaking across the world to each other. Boom Baby Stayed tuned for part 2 coming soon --- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/playingintraffic/message Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/playingintraffic/support
subjects: World Mission Society Church of God

episodes.title: 76 Interview with Lisa C. Former Member of WMSCOG
episodes.description: On this episode of the Pit pod we spoke with Lisa-a long-time former member of the WMSCOG. Her story begins in San Diego where she was serving in the military. She shares her experience with her mental health inside the WMSCOG and how they treated her. Thank you for sharing with us. We celebrate your freedom and beautiful new life. Please excuse any background noise. Here at the pit pod we are dog and kid lovers-we are Mom's ourselves so we know sometimes we must speak over the sweet baby noises. Enjoy!! --- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/playingintraffic/message Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/playingintraffic/support
subjects: World Mission Society Church of God

episodes.title: 74 Interview with Former Member Maria
episodes.description: In this interview we speak with Maria- Former member of the WMSCOG on the east coast. Maria was also an employee of the Lincoln Grill and she explains how this grill is connected to the WMSCOG. Listen all of the way until the end for a special message to Pastor Daniel Lee from Maria. episodes.title: 69 WMSCOG Wife Life Told By Toni
episodes.description: Speaking of marriages....let's talk about Toni's!! For the first time, Toni opens up about what marriage is like inside the cult of the world mission society church of god. This episode is not intended to discount the horror of arranged marriages. This is a story of how the WMSCOG tactically interferes in ALL interpersonal relationships to isolate victims. Thanks for listening!!! Sham offers unique insights of this cultic group. Please listen to the whole episode. It's interesting beginning to end. Also, Check out Michele and Raymonds Gofundme page and donate if you are able. They have both been past guests on our show and we wish them the very best on their legal battle with the WMSCOG. https://gofund.me/546849ac And check out this new article from a news station in Australia about the WMSCOG. https://7news.com.au/news/sa/amy-was-home-alone-when-she-got-a-knock-at-the-door-within-minutes-a-priest-was-putting-a-veil-over-her-head-c-11127166 --- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/playingintraffic/message Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/playingintraffic/support

episodes.title: 63 Respect your Sleep, Protect your sleep. An Episode about Sleep Deprivation
episodes.description: Most cult members experience some form of sleep deprivation, making it impossible for them to think clearly. We share how the World Mission Society Church of God controls sleep and leaves former members with nightmares. https://www.icsahome.com/articles/the-unique-characteristics-of-postcult-post-traumatic-stress-disorder-and-suggested-therapeutic-approaches-docx --- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/playingintraffic/message Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/playingintraffic/support

episodes.title: 56 Them Damn Yankees Visit South Carolina - An interview with cousin Traci
episodes.description: Welcome to Hampton county South Carolina, home of the Watermelon Festival. Tune in to our first ever out of state recorded interview with our cousin Traci. She was the first person to reach out to us after we started the podcast and we have been wanting to interview her for an episode ever since. Also this trip marks Toni's first ever family visit to South Carolina OUT of the cult! She got to enjoy a visit with our grandaddy, aunts , uncles and cousins without the looming weight of guilt and fear for the first time in over a decade. I'm calling this one my masterpiece you guys. You don't have to agree because Art is subjective but we hope you enjoy it. Thank you Traci for sharing your story with us and for being a great cousin and friend. We love and miss all of our family in South Carolina and mourn the loss of childhood and youth a little more with each visit. Here's to trapping every detail we can for later. Boom Baby --- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/playingintraffic/message Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/playingintraffic/support
subjects: World Mission Society Church of God

episodes.title: 51 Interview with former member Sarah
episodes.description: On this episode we talk with former member Sarah. Thank you Sarah for sharing your story with us. We talk about family involvement in the cult, mental illness and so much more. We hope everyone has a great and safe New Years and that 2023 brings you healing, freedom, and happiness wherever you are. Thank you to every person who listened to our podcast this year (Yes, even you who is listening on the inside of the WMSCOG to see if you can sue us for anything we might say on here. We even thank you for listening. Kind of find it endearing actually and hope you tune in next year.) This is not what we expected to happen when we decided to start our podcast and this past year will be one that we will always remember. We've met so many amazing people throughout this year and you are all inspiring. Thank you Chad, Kelsey, Jordan , Amonnie, Jordan from GLS, Dustin D, the Cannabis Connoisseur hosts Jack and Ryan, Kellie, Joanne, Raymond, Anthony, Michele, Luis, Emma, Caroline and AJ, Chris from SCJ, Kacey from Cult Vault , Berdine, and Sarah. HAPPY NEW YEAR !! BOOM BABY --- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/playingintraffic/message Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/playingintraffic/support
subjects: World Mission Society Church of God

episodes.title: 49 Failed Doomsday Prophecy with Anthony and Kelsey
episodes.description: Trigger warning : In this episode, among so many other things, we discuss what it was like for Toni , Anthony and Kelsey to really live in the mindset that the world was about to end at any moment. It gets real and intense but it's worth the listen when you're ready. Thank you all for sharing your experience ( you too Toni, that shit was traumatizing and I'm proud of you.) We pick apart the multiple failed doomsday predictions of the WMSCOG and if you're lucky, you might get to hear Anthony's newest Doomsday prediction. Stay tuned for more parts with our new Co hosts Anthony and Kelsey. Check out the links below for the random things we mentioned in this episode. How to Overcome Stress Video from WMSCOG https://youtu.be/ZbFHno6T89k Yeonmi Park's Tedtalk about leaving North Korea https://youtu.be/mLzTo-y8Ef0 --- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/playingintraffic/message Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/playingintraffic/support

episodes.title: 36 What was Michele Colón actually sued for?
episodes.description: If you've been wondering that the heck Michele Colón was sued for, look no further!! We get into the details about each item the World Mission Society Church of God in New Jersey tried to sue Michele for. Fun fact-court hearings are public record and you can obtain full audio recordings. On this show, we will share audio clips from The Motion to Dismiss the complaint against Michele. If you would like to read along with us, the court documents are available at https://www.examiningthewmscog.com/wmscog-files-second-multi-million-dollar-lawsuit-against-former-member/ A correction to Rick Ross's website, we mention it around 35 minutes in... His correct website is culteducation.com Here is a link to the YouTube videos we reference-WMSCOG Is a Cult- Public Financial Info https://youtu.be/-a-2yJ7YYdU and WMSCOG Destroys Families https://youtu.be/7uw7S2450u8 --- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/playingintraffic/message Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/playingintraffic/support

episodes.title: 15 The History of the church
episodes.description: Welcome back friends and family. Today we get into the history of the church. We talk about the Moonies, the SCJ and Toni's former church and how alike they are. We started a book club in this episode so grab your copy of Burnout and read along with us. Thank you Amonnie for letting us play your beautiful song on this episode. See the show notes for the lyrics. And stay tuned to future episodes where you will hear Amonnie's and many other fascinating stories. (The first letter of each word to the title of the song spells out the name of the church ) As a treat, here is the infamous dance video that Toni practiced so hard for. The song is an ear worm so I apologize now for it being stuck in your head for the rest of the day. https://youtu.be/_vYuESKvQQo Watch Me Still Continue On Growing By: Amonnie Russ (AMO) I had to turn around, cause I was in the wrong direction. A lonely path without protection while only using fear and guilt and not love to motivate me. Now I’m trying my hardest to undo your damage, you took advantage of my obedience. Gotta reclaim my power, made my sweetness sour, then stole my flowers now I’m replanting them Watch me still continue on growing (4X) Continue on Growing Continue on, Continue on Growing. You said I’d be invited as a guest without a fee but never valued my heart my worth was measured by my deeds Said you’d give me my sight, but your truth was blinding. Justifying your behavior while manipulating me. Watch me still continue on growing, in a field you said not worth sowing. No longer need approval cause I know it. I owned it, I loaned it, but you stole it! You told me I would change if I went astray, (If I went away) but now I’m just awake and you were just a fake. (4X) You said I’d be possessed, be love is my only possession. You tried to limit my perception, but reality is that the truth always was inside me. So now watch me still continue on to grow continue on to flow, and show love without motives. (2X) --- Send in a voice message: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/playingintraffic/message Support this podcast: https://podcasters.spotify.com/pod/show/playingintraffic/support
